summary: Comprehensive testing of FinGestão financial management system completed. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend has core functionality working but has critical SelectItem component issues affecting transaction creation.

ui_bugs.issue: SelectItem component requires non-empty value prop causing transaction creation form to fail
ui_bugs.error: A <SelectItem /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string

integration_issues.issue: Modal form fails to submit due to SelectItem value validation errors

issues: Charts not rendering properly due to container sizing
affected_screen: dashboard charts - Despesas por Categoria and Receitas vs Despesas

passed_tests: User registration with password validation (8+ chars, uppercase, lowercase, number)
User login returns access_token and refresh_token
Default Brazilian categories created on registration (Alimentação, Transporte, Moradia, Salário)
Transactions CRUD via API (backend tested successfully)
Dashboard endpoint returns complete data structure
Monthly report endpoint with correct calculations
Frontend navigation between pages (Dashboard, Transações, Categorias, Relatórios, Metas)
Responsive layout and Brazilian currency formatting (R$ format)

success_percentage.frontend: 80% - Core functionality works, but transaction form has critical SelectItem bug

critical: Fix SelectItem component validation in transaction creation form - ensure all SelectItem components have proper value props
Fix dashboard chart rendering issues - charts showing width/height -1 errors
high: Test transaction creation flow after SelectItem fix
medium: Test remaining CRUD operations through UI after fixes
Validate all form validation messages are in Portuguese
